rewards.description: 🎮 Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  🕒 Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  💰 Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  🎈 Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  🌟 How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Kakele Online - June 2.0

rewards.description: Challenge Yourself in PUBG’s Revamped Ranked Mode! Tune into any PUBG stream to see all the exciting changes to Ranked Mode this season, and unlock exclusive outfit and backpack skins while you're at it!   So, what’s new in Ranked? New tiers, the addition of Duo mode, better rewards… and that’s just the beginning. Click here for more information. And see you on the Battlegrounds.
rewards.name: Ranked Mode Revamped

Watch Time Rewards:
⏱️ Watch 15 mins – Diamond ×10
⏱️ Watch 30 mins – Diamond ×20
⏱️ Watch 45 mins – Bling ×20,000
⏱️ Watch 1 hour – Thread of Purity ×100
⏱️ Watch 1.5 hours – Shining Particle ×100
rewards.name: V1.6 Infinity Nikki

rewards.description: Celebrate the Radiance Rising update with unique rewards! Tune-in to your favorite Drops-enabled Palia content creator to receive Lucky Coins, Honeybunch Decor, and the Free Realms™ Chatty Plush!  Ever since we announced Palia, we’ve had tons of players tell us that it reminds them of a very special game from back in the day called Free Realms™. Since launching, we’ve had a ton of players tell us that it brought some of that magic back for them. In honor of this, we’ve asked our friends over at Daybreak Game Company if we could put a little something from Free Realms™ into Palia. And that's Chatty!
rewards.name: Radiance Rising Update

By watching participating streamers for a combined length of 3 hours, you can earn the entire Overseer Armor Set (Threshold Revision). This armor set is exclusive to Twitch Drops. The armor set is purely cosmetic and does not impact gameplay.

rewards.description: Dune: Awakening is a multiplayer survival game on a massive scale. Our first drops for Dune: Awakening will let players get their hands on the basics of the CHOAM Alternative building set. We will complete this set in later drops. These items work in addition to the existing building sets in-game.  To celebrate the launch players who participate in this campaign by purchasing or gifting 2 subs will also get a full Atreides Officer Suit.
rewards.name: Dune: Awakening Launch
